description.narrative: The project objective is to increase production and market access of rural families living in the Chambo and Chanchan-Chimbo river basins within Chimborazo Province, through investments in irrigation and roads improvement.

condition.narrative: Borrower has entered into a trust agreement with the Central Bank of Ecuador and entered into a restitution agreement with theGuarantor
By December 14, 2007, the Borrower has strengthened and updated the financial management system in a manner satisfactory to the Bank
Within 2 weeks after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall ensure that thefinancial management specialist (FM), the FM assistantand the treasury have been appointed
Within 3 months after Effective Date, the Borrower has appointed the senior staff of the procurement unit, submitted to the Bankthe revised budding documents and standard formats for bid evaluation
Within 3 months after the Effective Date, the external financial audit firm will be contracted
